message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested but $14,000 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $11,500?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $11,500 is a bit tight for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,000 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,500. What do you think?
I see you're willing to go up to $12,500, Bob! I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to meet you at $12,800, which is a great compromise. What do you think?
